metadata.description: Community-driven collection of GitHub Copilot plugins, agents, prompts, and skills

plugins.name: awesome-copilot
plugins.description: Meta prompts that help you discover and generate curated GitHub Copilot agents, collections, instructions, prompts, and skills.

plugins.name: azure-cloud-development
plugins.description: Azure cloud development tools including Infrastructure as Code, architecture patterns, and cost optimization.

plugins.name: cast-imaging
plugins.description: A comprehensive collection of specialized agents for software analysis, impact assessment, structural quality advisories, and architectural review using CAST Imaging.

plugins.name: clojure-interactive-programming
plugins.description: Tools for REPL-first Clojure workflows featuring Clojure instructions, the interactive programming chat mode and supporting guidance.

plugins.name: copilot-sdk
plugins.description: Build applications with the GitHub Copilot SDK across multiple programming languages. Includes comprehensive instructions for C#, Go, Node.js/TypeScript, and Python.

plugins.name: csharp-dotnet-development
plugins.description: Essential prompts, instructions, and chat modes for C# and .NET development including testing, documentation, and best practices.

plugins.name: csharp-mcp-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers in C# using the official SDK.

plugins.name: database-data-management
plugins.description: Database administration, SQL optimization, and data management tools for PostgreSQL, SQL Server, and general database development best practices.

plugins.name: dataverse-sdk-for-python
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection for building production-ready Python integrations with Microsoft Dataverse.

plugins.name: devops-oncall
plugins.description: A focused set of prompts, instructions, and a chat mode to help triage incidents and respond quickly with DevOps tools and Azure resources.

plugins.name: edge-ai-tasks
plugins.description: Task Researcher and Task Planner for intermediate to expert users and large codebases - Brought to you by microsoft/edge-ai

plugins.name: frontend-web-dev
plugins.description: Essential prompts, instructions, and chat modes for modern frontend web development including React, Angular, Vue, TypeScript, and CSS frameworks.

plugins.name: go-mcp-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers in Go using the official github.com/modelcontextprotocol/go-sdk.

plugins.name: java-development
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection of prompts and instructions for Java development including Spring Boot, Quarkus, testing, documentation, and best practices.

plugins.name: java-mcp-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Model Context Protocol servers in Java using the official MCP Java SDK with reactive streams and Spring Boot integration.

plugins.name: kotlin-mcp-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers in Kotlin using the official io.modelcontextprotocol:kotlin-sdk library.

plugins.name: mcp-m365-copilot
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection for building declarative agents with Model Context Protocol integration for Microsoft 365 Copilot.

plugins.name: openapi-to-application-csharp-dotnet
plugins.description: Generate production-ready .NET applications from OpenAPI specifications. Includes ASP.NET Core project scaffolding, controller generation, and entity framework integration.

plugins.name: openapi-to-application-go
plugins.description: Generate production-ready Go applications from OpenAPI specifications. Includes project scaffolding, handler generation, middleware setup, and Go best practices.

plugins.name: openapi-to-application-java-spring-boot
plugins.description: Generate production-ready Spring Boot applications from OpenAPI specifications. Includes project scaffolding, REST controller generation, and service layer organization.

plugins.name: openapi-to-application-nodejs-nestjs
plugins.description: Generate production-ready NestJS applications from OpenAPI specifications. Includes project scaffolding, controller and service generation, and TypeScript best practices.

plugins.name: openapi-to-application-python-fastapi
plugins.description: Generate production-ready FastAPI applications from OpenAPI specifications. Includes project scaffolding, route generation, and dependency injection.

plugins.name: partners
plugins.description: Custom agents that have been created by GitHub partners.

plugins.name: pcf-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for developing custom code components using Power Apps Component Framework for model-driven and canvas apps.

plugins.name: php-mcp-development
plugins.description: Comprehensive resources for building Model Context Protocol servers using the official PHP SDK with attribute-based discovery.

plugins.name: power-apps-code-apps
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for Power Apps Code Apps development including project scaffolding, development standards, and expert guidance.

plugins.name: power-bi-development
plugins.description: Comprehensive Power BI development resources including data modeling, DAX optimization, performance tuning, and visualization design.

plugins.name: power-platform-mcp-connector-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for developing Power Platform custom connectors with Model Context Protocol integration for Microsoft Copilot Studio.

plugins.name: project-planning
plugins.description: Tools and guidance for software project planning, feature breakdown, epic management, implementation planning, and task organization.

plugins.name: python-mcp-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers in Python using the official SDK with FastMCP.

plugins.name: ruby-mcp-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Model Context Protocol servers in Ruby using the official MCP Ruby SDK gem with Rails integration support.

plugins.name: rust-mcp-development
plugins.description: Build high-performance Model Context Protocol servers in Rust using the official rmcp SDK with async/await and procedural macros.

plugins.name: security-best-practices
plugins.description: Security frameworks, accessibility guidelines, performance optimization, and code quality best practices.

plugins.name: software-engineering-team
plugins.description: 7 specialized agents covering the full software development lifecycle from UX design and architecture to security and DevOps.

plugins.name: structured-autonomy
plugins.description: Premium planning, thrifty implementation.

plugins.name: swift-mcp-development
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection for building Model Context Protocol servers in Swift using the official MCP Swift SDK with modern concurrency features.

plugins.name: technical-spike
plugins.description: Tools for creation, management and research of technical spikes to reduce unknowns and assumptions before specification and implementation.

plugins.name: testing-automation
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection for writing tests, test automation, and TDD including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing.

plugins.name: typescript-mcp-development
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers in TypeScript/Node.js using the official SDK.

plugins.name: typespec-m365-copilot
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection of prompts, instructions, and resources for building declarative agents and API plugins using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot.
